entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
